description:
The man who was like a father to the solitary Chihiro transformed into a giant troll before his eyes.
Unable to fight properly, when Chihiro is struck by the creature`s blade, his eyes glow a deep red, and something begins to awaken inside him!
Can the blood staining his hands never be wiped clean? As Chihiro despairs, the mysterious and beautiful Yuri appears before him.
The sound of her bells drags Chihiro into an even more unforgiving battle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kimi wa Mada, Boku to Iu Ningen o Shiranai no Da
Tu ne connais pas encore l`humain que je suis
You Don`t Know Who I Am Yet
君はまだ, ぼくという人間を知らないのだ
